objectives.name: Foundation Stone
objectives.description: Place 2 ants to complete. Gain 1 resource and 1 VP.

objectives.name: Solid Foundation
objectives.description: Place 3 ants to complete. Draw 1 card and gain 2 VP.

objectives.name: Support Pillar
objectives.description: Place 4 ants to complete. Gain 2 resources and 3 VP.

objectives.name: Reinforced Pillar
objectives.description: Place 5 ants to complete. Draw 2 cards and gain 4 VP.

objectives.name: Bridge Arch
objectives.description: Place 6 ants to complete. Gain Architect Ant and 5 VP.

objectives.name: Grand Arch
objectives.description: Place 7 ants to complete. Gain 1 VP per completed objective and 6 VP.

objectives.name: Observatory Tower
objectives.description: Place 8 ants to complete. Gain 3 resources and 7 VP.

objectives.name: Sky Tower
objectives.description: Place 9 ants to complete. Gain Queen Ant and 8 VP.

objectives.name: Bridge Span
objectives.description: Place 10 ants to complete. Draw 3 cards and gain 10 VP.

objectives.name: Moonwalk Span
objectives.description: Place 12 ants to complete. Gain 5 bonus VP and 12 VP.

objectives.name: Lunar Gateway
objectives.description: Place 15 ants to complete. Double all VP from ant cards and gain 15 VP.

objectives.name: Moon Landing
objectives.description: Place 20 ants to complete. WIN THE GAME! Also gain 20 VP.

objectives.name: Cable Support
objectives.description: Place 4 ants to complete. All ants on construction gain +2 defense and 3 VP.

objectives.name: Supply Depot
objectives.description: Place 5 ants to complete. Gain 1 resource at start of each turn and 4 VP.

objectives.name: Ant Barracks
objectives.description: Place 6 ants to complete. Gain Elite Soldier Ant and 4 VP.
